attributes.action: Extend furlough scheme for theatre and live music industry.
attributes.additional_details: Without theatres and live music venues where will your culture grow? We need theatre from  Shakespeare to Jack in the Beanstalk. Live music venues start people’s careers & I argue that Rap to Opera are as important to our culture as football & pubs.
attributes.background:
Extend the furlough, even at a reduced rate. 

Save the technical crews before it’s to late.
